title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jan 6 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jan 6 2022
description:
Infuriating Democrats memorialize their "insurrection" lie. Kamala Harris compares January 6th to Pearl Harbor and 9/11. Clay says he wishes he could use expletives on the air after hearing her statement. It's important to push back against Democrat falsehoods -- not all of us are stupid, Buck declares. If a million cases of covid a day is success, what would failure look like? The "pandemic of the unvaccinated" is another Democrat lie -- for instance, 95 percent of those over 65 have been vaccinated. C&B take calls, including a man who know longer wants to be called "the unvaccinated." He prefers to be thought of as part of "the control group."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
